NK013(pa)007:0: sgyu 'phyul d+r+wa ba zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho
NK013(pa)007:1: ga rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so
NK013(pa)007:2: // dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i
NK013(pa)007:3: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rin chen phreng ba zhes
NK013(pa)007:4: // bya ba / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK013(pa)007:5: dpal ldan bde chen srid zhi kun gyi bdag /
NK013(pa)007:6: 'gyur med rdo rje bzhi dngos sems dpa' che //
NK013(pa)007:7: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i sprin //
NK013(pa)007:8: mngon par snang mdzad bla ma'i zhabs la 'dud //
NK013(pa)007:9: gang gi dkyil 'khor snying po'i grong khyer mchog /
NK013(pa)007:10: gdod ma'i gzhi dbyings bla na med pa'i gnas //
NK013(pa)007:11: rtogs pa'i rim pas mngon du byed pa'i thabs //
NK013(pa)007:12: myur bde'i lam mchog skal bzang kun dag'i skyes //
NK013(pa)007:13: bla med dngos grub mchog gang dbang bskur dang //
NK013(pa)007:14: sgrub pa'i rjes su 'gro zhing de nyid kyang //
NK013(pa)007:15: dkyil 'khor las kyi byed pa can gyi phyir //
NK013(pa)007:16: de yi cho ga rin chen phreng bar spel /
NK013(pa)007:24: phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rang bzhin 'di //
NK013(pa)007:25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid //
NK013(pa)007:27: sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te //
NK013(pa)007:28: sangs rgyas gzhan du ma 'tshol cig /
NK013(pa)007:29: ces gsungs pas gzhi'i rgyud ces bya ba gdul bya'i
NK013(pa)007:30: rgyud kyis bsdus pa gzhi 'bras gnyis su med pa'i
NK013(pa)007:31: de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin can no //
NK013(pa)007:33: rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni //
NK013(pa)007:34: yi ge sgra btags ming tshogs la //
NK013(pa)007:35: brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te //
NK013(pa)007:38: btso dang yan lag rnam bcu'o //
NK013(pa)007:39: zhes pas thabs kyi rgyud ces bya ba las kyi dngos po bsdus pa'i yan lag can te /
NK013(pa)007:40: yan lag ni dngos po bcur gnas pa rnams las 'dir /
NK013(pa)007:41: shes bya dngos po du ma las //
NK013(pa)007:42: gzhi rtsa dkyil 'khor dbang gi don //
NK013(pa)007:43: zhes pa'i dang po la yang /
NK013(pa)007:44: rang bzhin la sogs rnams pa bdun //
NK013(pa)007:45: zhes pa las 'dir lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor ston te /
NK013(pa)007:47: sa gzhi mnyam dang tshad thig dang //
NK013(pa)007:48: tshon dang bri dang rnam pa dang //
NK013(pa)007:49: rab gnas sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor du /
NK013(pa)007:51: / 'jug dang zhugs pa'i yon tan no //
NK013(pa)007:52: zhes rnam pa bcur bshad pa nyid kyang /
NK013(pa)007:55: mjug gi bya ba dang gsum du gnas pa'o //
NK013(pa)007:56: sbyor ba la yang bzhi ste /
NK013(pa)007:62: shin tu phra ba'i dam tshig mchog /
NK013(pa)007:63: ces gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sgo nas bsnyen pa bya ba ste /
NK013(pa)007:64: slob mar dbang bskur ba'i don du yin na /
NK013(pa)007:65: mos slob kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma dang /
NK013(pa)007:67: grangs kyi bsnyen pa gsum rab 'bring tha ma'i sgo
NK013(pa)007:68: nas gang 'grub tsam zhig sngon du 'gro ba gzhir
NK013(pa)007:69: byas nas / khyad par gyi ched du bsnyen pa kha gso ba la 'jug cing /
NK013(pa)007:70: tshogs sgrub kyi ched yin na lam nges rdzogs bsgom
NK013(pa)007:71: pa'i tshul gyis phyag rgya spros bcas man chad la
NK013(pa)007:72: brtan pa thob par bya dgos pa nyid do //
NK013(pa)007:73: gnyis pa las kyi gzhi bzung ba ni /
NK013(pa)007:74: ston pa mdzod ldan chu bo rdzogs //
NK013(pa)007:75: zhes sogs kyi mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje slob
NK013(pa)007:76: dpo na dbang gis yongs su smin cing dam tshig
NK013(pa)007:77: dag pa gang dag shes par bya ba'i gnas rnams
NK013(pa)007:78: la mkhas pas / ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa gsal //
NK013(pa)007:79: zhes sogs kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma'am sgrub pa'i grogs dang bcas pa ste /
NK013(pa)007:80: gnas dus yo byad sogs phun sum tshogs pa'i cha rkyen thams cad bzang zhing tshogs par bya ba'o //
NK013(pa)007:81: gsum pa sa'i cho ga la /
NK013(pa)007:82: gzhi dang rang mtshan blang dbang dang //
NK013(pa)007:83: sbyang byin bsrung dang bzung ba ni //
NK013(pa)007:84: zhes brgyad du bshad pa las 'dir bdun gyi /
NK013(pa)007:85: dang po sa'i gzhi la brtag pa ni gang du
NK013(pa)007:86: bya ba'i gzhi de'i nam mkha'i rin po che zur
NK013(pa)007:87: brgyad lta bu nas mang po'i bar ci rigs par
NK013(pa)007:88: mnyam zhing ran par 'khor la dwangs shing gsal bar
NK013(pa)007:89: snang ba ste / zur brgyad la sogs rtse mang da nga //
NK013(pa)007:90: zhes sogs gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK013(pa)007:92: shar ri dma' zhing gzhol ba /
NK013(pa)007:95: byang ri 'dud cing skyob pa ste /
NK013(pa)007:96: shar lho gzhol zhing 'jam pa la /
NK013(pa)007:97: mtho dang 'dud pa nub byang yin //
NK013(pa)007:99: mtshams kyi shar lho na brag ri rno zang nge ba /
NK013(pa)007:100: lho nub na bye ma shal le ba /
NK013(pa)007:101: nub byang na grog po'i sul ri /
NK013(pa)007:102: byang shar na mdung gi grud shul lta bu rnams
NK013(pa)007:103: med pa dang ri sna dang chu sna ma zug
NK013(pa)007:104: pa ste / tho sgro grog mdo chu sna sogs //
NK013(pa)007:105: dkyil 'khor dbang dgra mtshams brtag bya //
NK013(pa)007:109: lhun sdug la brjid chags pa /
NK013(pa)007:111: chu bo nub nas shar du bgrod pa /
NK013(pa)007:112: rlung chung zhing me tog dang nags tshal rgyas pa /
NK013(pa)007:113: bya skad snyan par sgrog cig bkra shis la byin chags pa ste /
NK013(pa)007:114: lhun sdug ri bo nags tshal ldan //
NK013(pa)007:115: rab tu snyoms shing snum bag can //
NK013(pa)007:116: zhes sogs gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK013(pa)007:117: gnyis pa sa rang gi mtshan nyid brtag pa la /
NK013(pa)007:121: phyi'i spang byas gzhi star star po dang /
NK013(pa)007:127: rtsi shing mi skye ba rnams so //
NK013(pa)007:128: nang gi spang bya brkos pa na /
NK013(pa)007:135: srog chags la sogs pa med pa'o //
NK013(pa)007:136: gnyis ka'i spang bya ny+aa gro ta la sogs pa'i dpes bstan pa ste /
NK013(pa)007:137: rim pa bzhin sa gyong pa dang /
NK013(pa)007:141: rtsub pa la sogs pa med pa'o //
NK013(pa)007:143: bkra shis pa'i rtsa dang me tog yod pa /
NK013(pa)007:144: kha dog bzang zhing snum bag che ba /
NK013(pa)007:147: brkos pa'i khung bu sa de nyid kyis bkang bas lhag pa'o //
NK013(pa)007:148: gsum pa sa blang ba la /
NK013(pa)007:149: snang ba las blang ba dang /
NK013(pa)007:150: mi snang ba las blang ba'o //
NK013(pa)007:152: brtags pas rung ba'i sa de rgyal po la sogs
NK013(pa)007:153: pa gzhan dbang na rin dang ldan pa'i ngag gis
NK013(pa)007:154: gsol te rang dbang du blang ba'o //
NK013(pa)007:157: sa'i lha mo 'khor bcas la blang ba'o //
NK013(pa)007:159: brtags pa'i gzhi der ba byung dang /
NK013(pa)007:161: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i man+dala dkyil 'khor gyi tshad dang mnyam par byas la mchod gtor bshams /
NK013(pa)007:162: der dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgoms la /
NK013(pa)007:163: mchod cing bstod nas 'dod don gsol te nam mkha' la 'degs pa'o //
NK013(pa)007:165: phyogs der sa lha'i man+dala dri dang ba byung gis
NK013(pa)007:166: byugs par ga bur dang tsan+dana gyi thig le gru
NK013(pa)007:167: bzhi me tog gis tshom bu dang bcas pa dang
NK013(pa)007:168: / sa bdag gi gtso 'khor gyi mchod gtor gser skyems dang bcas pa bshams te /
NK013(pa)007:169: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ngang nas /
NK013(pa)007:170: h'u big+h+n+aana ta kri ta phata /
NK013(pa)007:171: ces brjod pas rang nyid skad cig gis khro bo
NK013(pa)007:172: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ljang ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis
NK013(pa)007:173: pa / g.yas sna tshogs rdo rje 'phyar zhing /
NK013(pa)007:174: g.yon dril bu dkur brten pa khro bo'i chas can yum dang bcas pa'i skur gyur par bsam pa /
NK013(pa)007:175: mchod gtor gser skyems dang bcas pa ram yam kham gis sbyang la /
NK013(pa)007:176: +aahh+aum gis 'dod yon bdud rtsi'i phung por byin gyis brlab la /
NK013(pa)007:177: rang gi thugs ka nas l+aam yig ser po gcig
NK013(pa)007:178: chad pa man+dala gyi dbus su gnas pa las sa'i
NK013(pa)007:179: lha mo gser gyi mdog can zhi zhing 'dzum pa
NK013(pa)007:180: dar dang rin po ches brgyan pa /
NK013(pa)007:181: g.yas gser gyi bum pa dang /
NK013(pa)007:182: g.yon mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa /
NK013(pa)007:183: phag gi khri la bzhugs shing 'ja' tshon sna lnga'i 'od zer 'phro bar bsam la /
NK013(pa)007:184: ye shes lngas dbang bskur nas rnam snang bdag por gyur pa'i rigs lngas dbu brgyan /
NK013(pa)007:185: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab /
NK013(pa)007:186: badz+ra sa ma ya h'u dzah zhes pas snyan gsan dbab /
NK013(pa)007:187: don dam gser gyi sa la mnga' mdzad pa'i //
NK013(pa)007:188: rin chen mdzes pa'i pho brang yid 'ong ba //
NK013(pa)007:189: nyi zla skar ma dag gis rab brgyan te //
NK013(pa)007:190: yid du 'ong ba'i pho brang dbus na bzhugs //
NK013(pa)007:191: me tog dbus kyi sa la mnga' mdzad de //
NK013(pa)007:192: dbus kyi sa bdag lha mo sangs rgyas spyan //
NK013(pa)007:193: sku mdog btso ma rin chen gser gyi mdog /
NK013(pa)007:194: phyag g.yas rin chen gser gyi bum pa bsnams //
NK013(pa)007:195: phyag g.yon mchog sbyin phyag rgya ston mdzad pa'i //
NK013(pa)007:196: dbus kyi lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams //
NK013(pa)007:197: bdud rtsi mchod sbyin mgron du spyan 'dren na //
NK013(pa)007:198: byams thugs brtse phyir gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol //
NK013(pa)007:199: e h+ye hi ba su d+h+aa ri ma h+aa k+aa
NK013(pa)007:200: ru ni ka dri sh+ya hoh sa ma ya hoh
NK013(pa)007:202: zhes brjod cing lag pa rgyab sprad mathe'u chung sbrel ba'i rgyas /
NK013(pa)007:204: dzahh+aum bam hohs gnyis su med par bstim la /
NK013(pa)007:209: ming sngags la e dam ba lim sogs btags pas gtor ma phul la /
NK013(pa)007:210: lha mo chen mo sa 'dzin 'jig rten skyong //
NK013(pa)007:211: gser mdog phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsnams /
NK013(pa)007:213: / 'ja' tshon 'od ldan phag gi khri la bzhugs //
NK013(pa)007:214: de la phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul //
NK013(pa)007:217: zhes brgya rtsa bzlas pas 'dod pa'i las stsol ba
NK013(pa)007:218: la dgyes pa'i mdangs phyungs te 'khor bar bsam mo
NK013(pa)007:219: // de nas 'khor gyi sa bdag mchod pa ni /
NK013(pa)007:220: mchod gtor rnams sngar bzhin brlabs la snying ga'i 'od zer dang /
NK013(pa)007:221: s+th+aa na pa ti k+she tra p+aa la sa pa
NK013(pa)007:222: ri w+aa ra e h+ye hi zhes pas spyan drangs
NK013(pa)007:223: te / a k+aa ro'i sngags kyi gtor ma phul la /
NK013(pa)007:224: sa bdag lha klu 'khor dang bcas //
NK013(pa)007:225: gtor ma dam pa 'di bzhes la //
NK013(pa)007:226: bdag gi sgrub pa ma mthon bar //
NK013(pa)007:227: khyed la gnas 'di bdag g.yar gyis //
NK013(pa)007:228: ci bde bar ni gzhan du song //
NK013(pa)007:229: zhes mchod cing gser skyems kyang phul la /
NK013(pa)007:230: ya hi gats+tshasa rang gnas su btang la mchod gtor rnams gshegs /
NK013(pa)007:231: de nas lha mo dge ba'i dbang du gsol ba ni /
NK013(pa)007:232: sa yi phyogs 'dir rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag gis
NK013(pa)007:233: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes
NK013(pa)007:234: kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ched du sgyu
NK013(pa)007:235: 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhes su gsol
NK013(pa)007:236: bas dge ba'i stobs dang dpang mdzad du gsol zhes
NK013(pa)007:237: gsol la / lag gnyis khu tshur gyen du bstan pa'i mathe'u chung sprel /
NK013(pa)007:238: mdzub mo rtse sprad pa 'degs pa'i rgyas /
NK013(pa)007:240: zhes pas lha mo nam mkha' la dpang du bzhugs par bsam mo //
NK013(pa)007:241: de nas badz+ra sa ma ya h'u dzah zhes pas dpang po'i lha nam mkha' gang bar spyan drangs /
NK013(pa)007:242: h'u bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin bsdus nas bdag la thim pas /
NK013(pa)007:243: bdag gi lus 'od kyi gong bur gyur bar bsam /
NK013(pa)007:244: badz+ra ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru ka h'u phata /
NK013(pa)007:245: ces brjod pas rang nyid zhe sdang rdo rje sku
NK013(pa)007:246: mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas rdo
NK013(pa)007:247: rje dang g.yon dril bu 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)007:248: mi bzad pa'i khro bo 'bar ba'i sdang mig bgegs
NK013(pa)007:249: la blta ba'i rkang mthil dang snying gar h+aum las
NK013(pa)007:250: sna tshogs rdo rje me rab tu 'bar bar bsam
NK013(pa)007:251: zhing / bden pa'i stobs brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
NK013(pa)007:252: sa yi phyogs 'dir sogs nas dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs su gsol bas /
NK013(pa)007:253: gang su yang rung ba'i 'byung po gdug pa can
NK013(pa)007:254: g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa thams cad 'dir ma
NK013(pa)007:255: gnas par gzhan du dengs shing /
NK013(pa)007:256: gal te mi 'gro na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
NK013(pa)007:257: cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes las
NK013(pa)007:258: byung ba'i khro bo'i ye shes kyi rdo rje me
NK013(pa)007:259: rab tu 'bar ba 'dis khyed rnams kyi mgo bo
NK013(pa)007:260: tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ta re /
NK013(pa)007:264: yungs thun brab pa khro bo'i sprin du spro zhing /
NK013(pa)007:265: sum+b+ha bzla bas rdo rje gsor ba dang dril bu
NK013(pa)007:266: 'khrol bzhin pas rdo rje'i 'gros kyis bskor te bgegs
NK013(pa)007:267: bsgrad la / h'u ring por brjod pas khro bo
NK013(pa)007:268: rnams slar 'dus nas bsrung ba'i gur khang sna tshogs
NK013(pa)007:269: rdo rje me rab tu 'bar ba dang bcas pas
NK013(pa)007:270: phyogs mtshams thams cad khyab par bsam la /
NK013(pa)007:271: sa'i dbus su brjid bag dang bcas pas 'dug ste /
NK013(pa)007:272: lag g.yas pa'i mthe bos mathe'u chung mnan pa tri shu la'i rgyas /
NK013(pa)007:273: ji ltar che mchog rdo rje yis //
NK013(pa)007:274: dpung bzhi bdud kyi sde btul nas //
NK013(pa)007:275: rgyal srid chos kyi dpung btsugs pa //
NK013(pa)007:276: de bzhin du ni bdag gis kyang //
NK013(pa)007:277: nges par bya phyir dkyil 'khor bri //
NK013(pa)007:278: sa yi dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK013(pa)007:279: rat+na p+aa sham sid+d+hi ku ru sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK013(pa)007:280: zhes brjod pas lha mo 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'od
NK013(pa)007:281: du zhu nas sa gzhi la thim pas sa gzhi
NK013(pa)007:282: rin po che'i rang bzhin ye shes lnga'i ngo bor
NK013(pa)007:284: bzhi pa dbang du bya ba ni /
NK013(pa)007:285: zangs sam dmar po'i shing las phur bu rtse mo
NK013(pa)007:286: zla gam gzugs su byas pa zhig snod 'brus bkang
NK013(pa)007:287: ba la sogs par btsugs te bzhag la /
NK013(pa)007:288: pad+ma k+ai li k+ai la ya phata dzah zhes brjod
NK013(pa)007:289: pas rang gi snying ga'i h+aum las pad+ma he ru
NK013(pa)007:290: ka dmar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa dang po
NK013(pa)007:291: gnyis kyis pad+ma dang zhags pa /
NK013(pa)007:292: 'og ma gnyis phur bu sgril ba /
NK013(pa)007:293: smad phur bu zla gam rab tu 'bar ba'i rtse
NK013(pa)007:294: mo can du phyungs pa bkod pa'i phur bu dang
NK013(pa)007:296: k+aa ya badz+ra sogs kyis sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs te gzi byin dang ldan par byas la /
NK013(pa)007:297: pad+ma k+ai li k+ai la ya wa sham sa ma ye h'u /
NK013(pa)007:298: wa sham ku ru w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)007:299: zhes brjod bzhin par dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi la btab
NK013(pa)007:300: pas bur bu las byung ba'i 'od kyis sa gzhi
NK013(pa)007:301: thams cad khyab cing bdag gi dbang du gyur par
NK013(pa)007:303: sbyang ba las me sngags phyag rgya //
NK013(pa)007:306: dang po las dang bya bas sbyang ba la /
NK013(pa)007:308: gza' nyi ma rgyu ba'i ston zla tha chung la
NK013(pa)007:309: sogs pa'i zla ba gsum gsum la rim pa bzhin
NK013(pa)007:310: / shar lho nub byang du mgo lta zhing /
NK013(pa)007:311: lho la sogs par phyogs te nyal bas de'i lto ba'i thad nas sa brko bar bya'o //
NK013(pa)007:312: tshad ni dkyil 'khor ji tsam bya ba'i rgya'am /
NK013(pa)007:313: khru gang gru bzhi tsam pa sa'i skyon 'byin nus par brkos te /
NK013(pa)007:316: sol ba la sogs pa'i skyon rnams bsal nas /
NK013(pa)007:317: sa'i phud kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod la /
NK013(pa)007:318: sa de nyid kyis bkang bas mtho na bzang /
NK013(pa)007:321: yang dong de khru gang tsam du brus nas 'thas par bcags la chus bkang ste /
NK013(pa)007:322: yi ge brgya pa bzla bzhin du gom pa lnga
NK013(pa)007:323: bcur phyin nas log ste bltas pas gang na rab
NK013(pa)007:326: de nyid g.yas su 'khyil na'ang bzang /
NK013(pa)007:327: de las ldog na ngan pa'o //
NK013(pa)007:328: de dag las bzang por mthong nas brkos pa'i khung
NK013(pa)007:329: bu de nyid du rdzas sum cus gang ba'i bum
NK013(pa)007:330: pa a las la ba'i steng du tram las rin
NK013(pa)007:331: po che'i mchod sdong dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i gter du
NK013(pa)007:333: sngar gyi sa dang shis pa'i sa bzang po gzhan
NK013(pa)007:334: gyis kyang bkang la spos chus btab nas 'thas par
NK013(pa)007:335: bcags pa'i stegs bu dpangs su khru gang dang /
NK013(pa)007:336: rgyar khru gang la sogs pa nas ji tsam 'dod pa'i bar brtsigs la ngos mnyam par byas la /
NK013(pa)007:339: ba byung lnga dang bcas pa'i go ma yes khyab par bya'o //
NK013(pa)007:340: gnyis pa mes sbyang ba ni /
NK013(pa)007:341: gong gi mtshan ma rnams shin tu ngan par mthong na gzhan du spo ba'am /
NK013(pa)007:342: yang na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg tshul bzhin du byas pas bsal bar bya'o //
NK013(pa)007:343: gsum pa sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang ba ni /
NK013(pa)007:344: mtshan ma ngan pa 'bring tsam du snang na /
NK013(pa)007:345: rang gi lag pa g.yas kyi sor mo lnga la
NK013(pa)007:346: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor re re'i steng du h+aum mthing
NK013(pa)007:347: ga re res mtshan pa yongs su gyur pa las
NK013(pa)007:348: rdo rje rtse lnga h+aum gis mtshan par bsam la
NK013(pa)007:349: / badz+ra ha na ha na kro d+ha h+aum phata /
NK013(pa)007:350: ces brjod cing sa la lan gsum bsnun pas rdo
NK013(pa)007:351: rje dang h+aum gi 'od kyis sa'i nyes skyon thams
NK013(pa)007:352: cad sbyangs nas ye shes rang snang gi gzhir gyur
NK013(pa)007:353: par bsam mo // bzhi pa ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyang ba la /
NK013(pa)007:357: sa dang sar 'dzin pa'i 'khrul rtog thams cad stong
NK013(pa)007:358: nyid de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su rnam par dag
NK013(pa)007:359: par bsam la / ma h+aa sh+au nya t+aa dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK013(pa)007:362: h+aum gi sgra ring por brjod pas rang nyid skad
NK013(pa)007:363: cig gis h+aum las rdo rje sngon po h+aum yig
NK013(pa)007:364: mthing nag 'bar bas mtshan par gyur /
NK013(pa)007:365: de las e yam wam lam ram rnams 'og tu
NK013(pa)007:366: chad pa las 'byung lnga rim brtsegs kyi steng du
NK013(pa)007:368: b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he dz+ny+aa na badz+ra tsakra /
NK013(pa)007:369: zhes brjod pas ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i
NK013(pa)007:370: dkyil 'khor ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ba bzhin du
NK013(pa)007:371: bkra lam gyis gsal bar bsam mo //
NK013(pa)007:372: drug pa byin gyis brlab pa ni /
NK013(pa)007:373: gnas khang legs par brgyan la /
NK013(pa)007:374: slob dpon rgyas pa'i chas su zhugs nas rdo rje'i 'gros kyis mtha' bskor zhing /
NK013(pa)007:376: shar du phyogs pas dbus su 'khod la /
NK013(pa)007:377: sgrub thabs bzhin du bdag nyid gtso bo yab yum du bskyed nas /
NK013(pa)007:378: mnyam par sbyor ba'i byang chub sems kyi sprin las
NK013(pa)007:379: 'khor gyi lha rnams yan lag gi lha dang bcas
NK013(pa)007:381: byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis dkyil 'khor pa
NK013(pa)007:382: dang bcas pa'i dus gsum gyi mgon po sras dang
NK013(pa)007:383: bcas pa thams cad mkha' khyab tu sad par bsam
NK013(pa)007:384: zhing / badz+ra sa m+aa dzahs snyan gsan /
NK013(pa)007:388: bzhi bsnol sogs phyi nang gsang gsum gyi mchod pa rnams kyi mchod cing bstod par bya'o //
NK013(pa)007:389: de nas phyogs bzhir gnas pa'i slob ma /
NK013(pa)007:390: l+aam dwe sha ra ti sogs kyis yum bzhir bskyed /
NK013(pa)007:397: de rnams kyis gtso bo la /
NK013(pa)007:400: bzhi bsnol gyis mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas shar nas /
NK013(pa)007:401: zhi ba'i ye shes rang snang ba'i //
NK013(pa)007:402: rgyan rnams kun gyis rab mdzes pa //
NK013(pa)007:403: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku yi mchog /
NK013(pa)007:404: dkyil 'khor chen po gsung du gsol //
NK013(pa)007:406: yon tan rin chen 'byung ba'i gtso //
NK013(pa)007:407: ma lus kun gyi re skong ba //
NK013(pa)007:408: sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan mchog /
NK013(pa)007:410: rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med /
NK013(pa)007:412: / 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes //
NK013(pa)007:413: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gi mchog /
NK013(pa)007:415: bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pas //
NK013(pa)007:416: thams cad sgrol ba'i ded dpon mchog /
NK013(pa)007:417: sangs rgyas kun gyi phrin las bdag /
NK013(pa)007:418: dkyil 'a khor chen po gsung du gsol //
NK013(pa)007:419: thams cad kyis thun mong du /
NK013(pa)007:420: bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs shing //
NK013(pa)007:421: rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil //
NK013(pa)007:423: dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol //
NK013(pa)007:425: bzhi med na gcig gis kyang phyogs de dag tu song nas bya /
NK013(pa)007:426: de yang med na bsgoms pas kyang rung ngo //
NK013(pa)007:427: de nas slob dpon gyi rdor dril 'dzin cing 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis bltas te /
NK013(pa)007:428: phyogs bcu ma lus dus gsum gyis //
NK013(pa)007:429: rgyal ba sras bcas dgongs su gsol //
NK013(pa)007:430: che ge mo sogs don gyi phyir //
NK013(pa)007:431: dkyil 'khor chen po bdag bgyid pas //
NK013(pa)007:432: bdag cag rjes su bzung ba'i phyir //
NK013(pa)007:433: sa 'di shis par byin rlabs par //
NK013(pa)007:434: bde bar gshegs pas mdzad du gsol //
NK013(pa)007:435: zhes nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su bskul la /
NK013(pa)007:436: h+aum bzhis byin bsdus nas rang la bstim /
NK013(pa)007:437: de nas snyems pa dang bcas pas langs te /
NK013(pa)007:438: 'gro ba rnams la snying rjer bltas nas /
NK013(pa)007:439: slar yang rang nyid zhe sdang rdo rje 'jigs shing
NK013(pa)007:440: rngams pa mi bzad pa'i khro bo'i sprin spro ba'i
NK013(pa)007:441: skur gyur pa'i mig gnyis ma dang ta las nyi
NK013(pa)007:443: mig 'bras h+aum las bskal ba'i mer 'bar bas kun tu blta zhing /
NK013(pa)007:444: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
NK013(pa)007:445: dang thugs rdo rjer mi phyed pa'i nga rgyal dang
NK013(pa)007:446: ldan pas / rdo rje 'dzin pa nyi ma dang /
NK013(pa)007:447: chos dang rta mchog snang mdzad kyang //
NK013(pa)007:448: bdag nyid chen po nga nyid yin //
NK013(pa)007:449: thams cad bka' las deng ma 'da' /
NK013(pa)007:452: thugs ka'i h+aum las khro bo'i sprin mi bzad pa
NK013(pa)007:453: spro zhing rkang mthil gnyis su h+aum las 'bar ba'i
NK013(pa)007:454: rdo rje re res mtshan par bsam la /
NK013(pa)007:455: rdo rje gsor ba dang dril bu 'khrol zhing /
NK013(pa)007:456: h+aum bzhi pa'i sngags drag tu sgrog pa dang bcas pas dbang ldan nas brtsams te /
NK013(pa)007:457: rdo rje'i 'gros kyi g.yas su bskor nas dkyil 'khor
NK013(pa)007:458: gyi gzhi cis kyang mi shigs pa rdo rje'i rang
NK013(pa)007:459: bzhin du brtan par byin gyis brlab bo //
NK013(pa)007:461: mig la sogs pa'i h+aum yig las 'od zer 'phros /
NK013(pa)007:465: gur bla re phyi rol bskal ba'i me dpung rab
NK013(pa)007:466: tu 'bar ba'i dbus su b+h+r+aum las byung ba'i 'khor
NK013(pa)007:467: lo ser po rtsibs brgyad logs dang /
NK013(pa)007:468: rtsa rtse steng 'og tu phyogs shing rno ba'i dbal dang ldan pa /
NK013(pa)007:469: lte ba chos kyi dbyings dang ma nyam pa'i dbus
NK013(pa)007:470: su bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rjer gnas pa'i thugs
NK013(pa)007:471: ka'i h+aum las ma bcu 'phros pa rtsibs nang rnams
NK013(pa)007:473: slar yang thugs ka nas khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po 'phros /
NK013(pa)007:474: phyogs bcu'i bgegs rnams bkug ste nyi gdan rnams kyi
NK013(pa)007:475: steng du myos shing 'gyel stabs su 'khod par bsam
NK013(pa)007:476: la / h+aum bzhi pa'i sngags brjod /
NK013(pa)007:477: slar yang thugs ka nas khro bo bcu phyung ste /
NK013(pa)007:478: mdun du bkod pa'i phur pa rnams dang gnyis su
NK013(pa)007:479: med par gyur pa ni stod khro bo'i gzugs can
NK013(pa)007:480: / smad phur bu 'bar ba'i rnam pa can du gyur par bsam la /
NK013(pa)007:481: badz+ra kro d+ha h+aum k+aa ra h+aum gardza gardza h+aum phata /
NK013(pa)007:482: ces sogs khro bo bcu so so'i sngags kyi mthar /
NK013(pa)007:483: g+ha g+ha g+h+aa ta ya g+h+aa ta ya /
NK013(pa)007:485: k+ai la ya k+ai la ya sarba p+aa pam phata /
NK013(pa)007:487: badz+ra k+ai la ya badz+ra d+ha ra +aa dz+ny+aa pa
NK013(pa)007:488: ya ti sarba big+h+n+aana k+aa ya w+aa ka tsit+ta badz+ra
NK013(pa)007:491: khro bo rnams phyogs bcu'i bgegs la phur bu'i tshul
NK013(pa)007:492: du btab pas de rnams kyi lus phug ste g.yo
NK013(pa)007:493: 'gul med cing 'od gsal bar bsam la /
NK013(pa)007:496: steng gi phur bu shar dang /
NK013(pa)007:497: 'og gi phur bu nub tu gdab par bya'o //
NK013(pa)007:498: de nas mtshon cha lnga'i rim pas bsrung ste /
NK013(pa)007:499: sgrub thabs las shes par bya zhing /
NK013(pa)007:500: rdo rje'i gar dang stangs stabs kyi rol pa ci rigs pa'ang bya'o //
NK013(pa)007:501: de ltar chos thams cad sems las logs su med la /
NK013(pa)007:502: sems kyang stong nyid nam mkha'i rang bzhin du gnas
NK013(pa)007:503: pas bar du gcad bya gcod byed thams cad dmigs
NK013(pa)007:504: su ma grub pa de kho na nyid kyi bsrung
NK013(pa)007:505: ba'o // sngar bshad pa'i sa'i cho ga phal cher
NK013(pa)007:506: dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa logs su byed pa dang
NK013(pa)007:507: ba'o // / brkos nas stegs bu bya dgos pa'i sar yin la /
NK013(pa)007:508: gzhan du na mi snang ba las bslang ba tsam sngon du 'gro bas dbang du bya ba dang /
NK013(pa)007:509: sngags rgya ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyang ba rnams byas nas /
NK013(pa)007:510: sa byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i las la 'jug cing /
NK013(pa)007:511: brgyad pa sa bzung ba ni 'og tu mdzad pa phyag len yin no //
NK013(pa)007:512: de dag ni nub dang po'i bya ba'o //
NK013(pa)007:513: bzhi pa sta gon nam lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga la /
NK013(pa)007:515: yan lag rab gnas gnyis las /
NK013(pa)007:518: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshad bstan pa'o //
NK013(pa)007:529: nyi shu rtsa lnga pa ste /
NK013(pa)007:530: re re yang che chung gnyis gnyis kyis bstan pa ni gnas khang gi yangs dog dang /
NK013(pa)007:532: 'du byed rkyen gyi khyad par las ji ltar rigs par bya ba ste /
NK013(pa)007:533: tshad ni rkyen gyis ma nges te /
NK013(pa)007:534: zhes gsungs pa sngar las dang bya bas sbyang ba'i skabs su shes par bya ba nyid dang /
NK013(pa)007:536: rgyang grags dang dpag tshad la sogs pa nas ji srid /
NK013(pa)007:537: nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par //
NK013(pa)007:538: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs sgom //
NK013(pa)007:540: rtsa ba'i gsum pa thig dang /
NK013(pa)007:541: bzhi pa tshon gyi bya ba gnyis ni /
NK013(pa)007:542: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i lhag gnas rnams kyi khongs su
NK013(pa)007:543: lag len 'brel sdebs nas gseb tshags su shes par
NK013(pa)007:546: yan lag can gyi rab gnas so //
NK013(pa)007:549: cho ga dngos gnyis kyi dang po ni /
NK013(pa)007:550: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gang du bya ba'i dbang ldan
NK013(pa)007:551: gyi phyogs su khru do ba'i man+dala dris byug la
NK013(pa)007:552: / sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad rdo rje'i ra ba dang bcas pa bri /
NK013(pa)007:553: de'i dbus su las bum chas ldan rdo rje rgya gram gyi mtshan ma can dgod /
NK013(pa)007:554: shar du ye shes dang las kyi thig skud /
NK013(pa)007:556: nub tu thod chu bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa /
NK013(pa)007:558: dbus dang mtshams kyi pad 'dab bzhi la rdul tshon
NK013(pa)007:559: lnga mdog rigs sdebs pa dpa' bo 'bru lnga bkod
NK013(pa)007:560: pa dang / de dag gi mthar mchod gtor spyi dang mthun par bsham mo //
NK013(pa)007:562: sngon 'gro nas bzung bdag gi rnal 'byor bzlas pa'i
NK013(pa)007:563: mthar thug pa sngon du 'gro bas las bum bsang
NK013(pa)007:564: sbyangs / stong pa'i ngang las b+h+r+aum las byung ba'i
NK013(pa)007:565: rin po che'i bum pa mtshan nyid thams cad yongs
NK013(pa)007:566: su rdzogs pa'i nang du nyi ma'i gdan la h'u
NK013(pa)007:567: las sna tshogs rdo rje h'u gis mtshan pa yongs
NK013(pa)007:570: ces brjod pas khro bo mi 'chi thab sbyor ljang
NK013(pa)007:571: nag rgya gram dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i skur gyur
NK013(pa)007:572: par bsam zhing / las rigs bdag por byas pa'i ye shes lngas dbang bskur /
NK013(pa)007:573: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab /
NK013(pa)007:574: badz+ra sa m+aa dzahs snyan gsan dbab /
NK013(pa)007:576: dzahh+aum bam hohs gnyis med du bstim /
NK013(pa)007:577: k+aa ya w+aa ka tsit+ta tish+tha badz+rasa brtan par byas /
NK013(pa)007:578: kun bzang zhabs bsil bzhi bsnol gyis mchod /
NK013(pa)007:579: rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i rgyas las bum la reg ste /
NK013(pa)007:580: h'u big+h+n+aana ta kri ta phata /
NK013(pa)007:581: ces brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i mthar lha 'od du
NK013(pa)007:582: zhu nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor 'khyil
NK013(pa)007:583: bar bsam zhing / bum chu 'thor yab kyis blangs te /
NK013(pa)007:584: swa b+h+aa wa bi shud+d+ha d+harma t+aa badz+ra sid+d+hi h'u /
NK013(pa)007:586: bdag gnas yo byad thams cad la gtor bas nyes skyon dag par bsam mo //
NK013(pa)007:587: de ni lhag gnas thams cad la bsang gtor bya ba'i don du'o //
NK013(pa)007:588: de nas thig gi lhag gnas ni /
NK013(pa)007:596: ye thig gi rgyu pad+ma'i snal ma sogs dang /
NK013(pa)007:597: las thig gi rgyur ras bal la sogs pa ste dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'o /
NK013(pa)007:599: / 'khal ba'i grogs gzhon nu ma mtshan ldan bcu drug lon pa la sogs pa'o //
NK013(pa)007:600: tshad srid du 'dzin pa'i cha ma gtogs pa dkyil 'khor las nyis 'gyur dang /
NK013(pa)007:601: spoms su sgo'i nyi shu cha ste cha chung gi lnga cha'o //
NK013(pa)007:602: grangs ni ye shes kyi thig skud tshon sna lngas bsgyur ba lnga tshan lnga'am lnga tshan gcig dang /
NK013(pa)007:603: dam tshig gi thig skud dkar dmar sngo ba gsum tshan gsum mam gsum tshan gcig go //
NK013(pa)007:606: ces las bum gyi chus bsang /
NK013(pa)007:608: stong pa'i ngang las nyi zla'i gdan lnga'i steng du
NK013(pa)007:609: rang gi thugs ka nas h+aum s+w+aa +aam h+aam 'phros
NK013(pa)007:610: / ye shes kyi thig skud la thim pas dpa' bo 'bru lngar gyur /
NK013(pa)007:611: slar yang nyi zla'i gdan gsum gyi steng du thugs ka nas +aahh+aum 'phros /
NK013(pa)007:612: dam tshig gi thig skud la thim pas yi ge gsum du gyur par bsam la /
NK013(pa)007:613: rang gi thugs ka'i h+aum las 'od zer 'phros pas
NK013(pa)007:614: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mdun gyi nam mkhar
NK013(pa)007:615: spyan drangs / kun bzang zhabs bsil la sogs pas mchod cing gsol ba btab nas /
NK013(pa)007:616: rang gi mig gnyis dzahyiga las skyes pa'i nyi zlar bsam la /
NK013(pa)007:617: dip+ta drish+ta am ku sha dzah zhes brjod cing rdzi
NK013(pa)007:618: ma bskyod pa 'bar ba'i lta stangs kyis bskul bas
NK013(pa)007:619: nam mkha'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sbyor ba mdzad
NK013(pa)007:620: par mos te / ma h+aa sh+au nya t+aa sogs
NK013(pa)007:621: ye shes lnga'i sngags rnams brjod pas de rnams kyi
NK013(pa)007:622: thugs ka nas ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi 'od
NK013(pa)007:624: ye shes kyi thig skud so so la thim pas
NK013(pa)007:625: de nyid ye shes lnga'i ngo bor gyur par bsam
NK013(pa)007:626: zhing / 'bru lnga brjod bzhin du slob ma dang
NK013(pa)007:627: bcas pas dang por srad bu lnga tshan re re
NK013(pa)007:628: zhing / so sor sgril / de nas lnga po
NK013(pa)007:629: yang gcig tu sgril ba brdogs nas gser la sogs
NK013(pa)007:631: de bzhin du k+aa ya badz+ra sogs sku gsung thugs
NK013(pa)007:632: kyi sngags gsum brjod pas nam mkha'i de bzhin gshegs
NK013(pa)007:633: pa rnams kyi gnas gsum nas rdo rje gsum gyi
NK013(pa)007:634: rang bzhin gyi 'od zer dkar dmar mthing gsum byung
NK013(pa)007:635: / dam tshig gi thig skud so so la thim
NK013(pa)007:636: pas de nyid sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor gyur
NK013(pa)007:637: / par bsam zhing / 'bru gsum brjod bzhin du gsum tshan re re so sor sgril /
NK013(pa)007:638: de nas gsum po yang gcig tu dril la sngar bzhin bzhag go //
NK013(pa)007:639: gdab thabs dang spyod lam ni 'og tu bstan no //
NK013(pa)007:640: de nas rdo rje dang dril bu'i rab gnas ni /
NK013(pa)007:641: sngar bzhin bsar sbyangs stong pa'i ngang las rdo rje
NK013(pa)007:642: rtse lnga pa'i lte ba la kun tu bzang po
NK013(pa)007:643: / yar gyi rwa lnga la rigs kyi yab lnga /
NK013(pa)007:644: mar gyi rwa lnga la rigs kyi yum lnga /
NK013(pa)007:645: yas mas kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad la sems dpa' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad /
NK013(pa)007:646: dril bu'i lte ba dang pad ma'i 'dab ma brgyad kyi phyogs bzhir rigs kyi yum lnga /
NK013(pa)007:647: mtshams bzhir gsang ba'i yum bzhi /
NK013(pa)007:648: zhal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang /
NK013(pa)007:649: rtse mo rdo rje rigs kyi yab lnga rnams kyi skur gsal bar ba skyed la /
NK013(pa)007:657: h'u +aah zhes brjod pas lha rnams 'od du zhu /
NK013(pa)007:659: zhes brjod pas rdo rje thabs kyi rang bzhin ye shes lnga'i ngo bo dang /
NK013(pa)007:660: dril bu shes rab kyi rang bzhin stong nyid chos kyi sgra dbyangs sgrog pa dang /
NK013(pa)007:661: gnyis ka'ang don dam pa'i byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du mos pa brtan par byas la /
NK013(pa)007:663: rdo rje dril bu rig pa 'dzin //
NK013(pa)007:664: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i /
NK013(pa)007:667: chos la de bzhin dbang sgyur shog /
NK013(pa)007:671: de nas thod chu'i rab gnas ni /
NK013(pa)007:673: stong pa'i ngang las dam rdzas kyi steng du /
NK013(pa)007:674: h'u s+w+aa +aam h+aam las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
NK013(pa)007:675: sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi de bzhin
NK013(pa)007:676: gshegs pa lnga re re yang rigs lnga'i rang bzhin
NK013(pa)007:684: mchod la 'bru lnga brgya rtsa sogs bzlas pa'i mthar /
NK013(pa)007:685: h'u zhes brjod pas 'od du zhu ba ye shes kyi bdud rtsir 'khyil bar bsam mo //
NK013(pa)007:686: de nas tshon lhag gnas ni /
NK013(pa)007:694: mtshon bya ye shes lnga mtshon byed rdul mtshon du bstan pa'o //
NK013(pa)007:696: rab in+d+ra n+ai la la sogs pa rin po che lnga'i phye ma dang /
NK013(pa)007:697: 'bring 'bras la sogs pa'i phye ma la de dag bsres pa dang /
NK013(pa)007:698: tha ma so phag la sogs pa'i phye ma ste tshon sna lngas kha dog bsgyur ba'o //
NK013(pa)007:700: tshon sna lnga so so la lnga tshan du phye ba'am /
NK013(pa)007:701: lnga tshan gcig gis kyang ngo //
NK013(pa)007:704: stong pa'i ngang las tshon sna lnga'i steng du /
NK013(pa)007:706: m+aum l+aam m+aam p+aam t+aam rnams gnas par gyur /
NK013(pa)007:707: s+pha ra sam 'phro 'dus so so'i phyag mtshan sa
NK013(pa)007:708: bon gyis mtshan pa rnams su gyur pa las de
NK013(pa)007:709: bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga yum dang bcas pa'i skur
NK013(pa)007:718: +aahsarba pany+tsa rat+na sa ma ye h+aum h+aum /
NK013(pa)007:719: zhes ci nus bzlas pa'i mthar /
NK013(pa)007:720: h+aum zhes brjod pas lha rnams 'od zhu nas rin
NK013(pa)007:721: po che'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul tshon 'bar bar
NK013(pa)007:722: bsam zhing / bris pa'i yig 'bru rnams kyang mi mngon par spungs shing bsnun par bya'o //
NK013(pa)007:723: dgye ba dang nyes spong ni 'og tu bstan no //
NK013(pa)007:724: gnyis pa yan lag can gyi rab gnas la /
NK013(pa)007:727: lha lhag par gnas pa dang gsum las /
NK013(pa)007:728: dang po bum pa'i rab gnas la /
NK013(pa)007:732: gser dngul zangs la sogs pa'i bum pa mi gnag cing gsus pa che ba /
NK013(pa)007:736: zhabs zhum pa la sogs pa'i tshad dang mtshan nyid can lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa'am /
NK013(pa)007:737: yang na rigs kyi dbye bsdus lha'i bum pa lnga
NK013(pa)007:738: dang sngar bshad pa'i las kyi bum pa dang drug
NK013(pa)007:742: de dag thog mar gtsang zhing dag par byas la /
NK013(pa)007:744: las sngags bzla zhing yungs kar gyis brab pas bgegs bskrad la /
NK013(pa)007:745: chu gtsang ma srog chags med pa dri bzang dang
NK013(pa)007:746: sbyar ba kun bzang yab yum gyi sngags bzla bzhin
NK013(pa)007:747: du sum gnyis kyi tshad du longs par bkang ba
NK013(pa)007:757: a pa ra tshe ta ste sman lnga /
NK013(pa)007:758: gser dngul la mu tig byu ru mu men te rin po che lnga /
NK013(pa)007:759: nas 'bras gro til sran ma ste 'bru lnga /
NK013(pa)007:760: gur gum gla rtsi dza ti tsan+dana dkar dmar te dri lnga'o //
NK013(pa)007:761: de ltar lnga tshan lnga po rnams sde tshan re re rim pa bzhin mi bskyod pa dang /
NK013(pa)007:765: don grub rnams kyi sngags kyis rim pa bzhin gzhug pa'am /
NK013(pa)007:766: rdzas sngags cig car du dril bas kyang rung zhing /
NK013(pa)007:767: rang mdog dang mtshungs pa'i na bza' zung gis mgul chings sems dpa'i sngags kyis dkri /
NK013(pa)007:768: yal ga dang lo ma dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i shing gis kha brgyan sgo ba'i sngags kyis gzhug /
NK013(pa)007:769: me tog gi phreng ba dang ldan pa'i gzugs thag rdo rje thub pa drug gi sngags kyis bzhag /
NK013(pa)007:770: bum pa lha grangs dang mnyam pa la ni so so'i phyag rgya'i mtshan ma rnams dgod cing /
NK013(pa)007:771: dkyil 'khor gyi lha gnas 'byung 'gyur so sor ku sha'i gdan la phyogs ma 'chol bar bzhag /
NK013(pa)007:772: bum pa lnga pa'i tshe na rigs lnga'i mtshan ma
NK013(pa)007:773: so sor bkod la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus dang phyogs
NK013(pa)007:774: bzhir bzhag / bum pa gcig las med na mtshan
NK013(pa)007:775: ma rnams de la bkod nas dkyil 'khor gyi gtso
NK013(pa)007:777: mtha' mchod pa rnams kyis ji ltar mdzes par bskor /
NK013(pa)007:778: las bum sgo'i nang rol gyi g.yas sam rang gi
NK013(pa)007:779: mdun sogs gang bder bsang gtor gyi don du bzhag
NK013(pa)007:781: bum pa rnams las thams cad pas bsang /
NK013(pa)007:782: sh+au nya tas stong par sbyang /
NK013(pa)007:783: stong pa'i ngang las b+h+r+aum las byung ba'i rin po che'i bum pa lto ba ldir ba /
NK013(pa)007:786: mchu 'phyang ba lha rdzas kyi gos kyi mgul chings dang /
NK013(pa)007:787: dpag bsam shing gis kha rgyan dang ldan pa'i nang du /
NK013(pa)007:788: tap+te tap+te ma h+aa tap+te s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)007:789: zhes bzlas pas lha'i chu bo gad+g+aa dang bum chu dbyer med par mos la /
NK013(pa)007:790: bum pa lha grangs dang mnyam pa yod na so so'i gdan la lha de dang de bskyed cing /
NK013(pa)007:791: lnga yod na dbus mar mi bskyod pa dang /
NK013(pa)007:797: gshin rje gshed rnams yum bcas /
NK013(pa)007:801: stobs po che rnams yum bcas /
NK013(pa)007:809: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba rnams yum bcas bskyed cing /
NK013(pa)007:810: bum pa gnyis pa'i tshe rnam rgyal bum pa'i nang du /
NK013(pa)007:811: lha rang rang gi gdan gyi steng du /
NK013(pa)007:817: dza h'u bam hoh h'u h'u h'u h'u /
NK013(pa)007:819: k+r+aim trum srum pram k+sham ye rnams gnas par gyur /
NK013(pa)007:820: s+pha sam 'phro 'dus yongs su gyur pa las so
NK013(pa)007:821: so'i phyag mtshan sa bon gyis mtshan pa rnams su
NK013(pa)007:822: gyur / s+pha sam slar yang 'phro 'dus yongs su gyur pa las /
NK013(pa)007:823: h'u badz+ra d+h+rika sogs so so'i bskyed sngags rnams rim pa bzhin brjod pas /
NK013(pa)007:824: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
NK013(pa)007:825: te bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
NK013(pa)007:826: 'khor lo thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gsal bar
NK013(pa)007:835: bdag gi zhal nas sngags kyi phreng ba gzungs thag
NK013(pa)007:836: la 'khril te song bas bum pa'i lha rnams kyi
NK013(pa)007:837: thugs rgyud bskul / snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang sems
NK013(pa)007:838: ye shes kyi bdud rtsir babs pas bum pa gang
NK013(pa)007:839: thugs rgyud bskul / bar bsam zhing / lha so
NK013(pa)007:840: so'i sngags gtso 'khor gyi 'gros sbyar ba ci nus
NK013(pa)007:842: gtso bo'i sngags lan bdun bzlas nas sngar gyi thod chu bum nang du phul bas /
NK013(pa)007:843: lha thams cad chags pa chen pos ye shes kyi
NK013(pa)007:844: bdud rtsir zhu ba bum chu dang ro gcig tu
NK013(pa)007:846: bdug spos kyi bdug par bya'o //
NK013(pa)007:847: gzhan du 'dir sngags kyis ba tab pa'i me tog dkar po gzhug par yang bshad do //
NK013(pa)007:851: bsgrub pa dngos grub kyi dbang len pa rnams la bum pa nges par 'cha' dgos mod /
NK013(pa)007:852: sgrub mchod tsam la nges par dgos pa ma yin kyang 'grub na ni legs so //
NK013(pa)007:853: gnyis pa slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga ni dbang chog tu shes par bya'o //
NK013(pa)007:854: gsum pa lha lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga ni /
NK013(pa)007:855: sa bzung ba'i sa khongs smos pa nyid de /
NK013(pa)007:856: de la thig gdab pa dang /
NK013(pa)007:859: lhag gnas byas pa'i bum pa rnams dben par bzhugs su gsol nas /
NK013(pa)007:861: +aahh+aum sarba sam sho d+ha ni h+aum phata /
NK013(pa)007:862: ces las bum gyi chus dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi la
NK013(pa)007:863: bsang gtor byas nas bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'i dris
NK013(pa)007:864: byug cing 'bri bar 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha'
NK013(pa)007:866: dam tshig gi thig skud dri zhim po'i thig chal
NK013(pa)007:867: las phyungs pa cho ga bzhin du gtong len byas
NK013(pa)007:868: la / dang por shar nub tshangs thig gdab //
NK013(pa)007:869: dbus nas phyogs bzhir mtshan ma bya //
NK013(pa)007:870: shar nub tshad nas gnyis pa dang //
NK013(pa)007:871: phyogs bzhi'i tshad nas zur thig btsal //
NK013(pa)007:872: tshangs pa'i thig gi phyogs bzhi ru //
NK013(pa)007:873: cha chen dgu dgu bco brgyad las //
NK013(pa)007:874: rtsa ba'i brgyad cha sgo yin te //
NK013(pa)007:875: sgo yi bzhi cha cha phran no //
NK013(pa)007:876: tshangs thig nas bzung dang po dang //
NK013(pa)007:877: drug pa phyed gdab phyi ma bsil //
NK013(pa)007:878: gnyis bdun brgyad rnams cha bzhi dang //
NK013(pa)007:879: lnga dgu dbus dor mtha' gnyis gdab //
NK013(pa)007:880: gsum pa mi gdab bzhi pa'i nang //
NK013(pa)007:881: cha phran gcig tu gdab par bya //
NK013(pa)007:882: dbus nas zlum bskor cha phran lnga //
NK013(pa)007:883: gcig dang lnga dang gcig rnams ni //
NK013(pa)007:884: lte ba mu khyud rtsibs rtsibs brten //
NK013(pa)007:885: gru thig phyi ru cha phran gcig /
NK013(pa)007:886: srid du sgo tshad glo 'bur te //
NK013(pa)007:887: de nas rim bzhin khyams rtsig la /
NK013(pa)007:889: / 'dod snam pha gu d+r+wa phyed dang //
NK013(pa)007:890: shar bu mda' yab rnams kyi sa //
NK013(pa)007:891: sgo khyud cha chen 'gram dang logs //
NK013(pa)007:892: de yi phyed yin mun pa dang //
NK013(pa)007:893: ka ba ka rgyan cha phran re //
NK013(pa)007:894: rta babs brgyad po cha mnyam las //
NK013(pa)007:895: dang po ka rgyan mtha' dang mnyam //
NK013(pa)007:896: gnyis gsum de las gcig phyir bkyed //
NK013(pa)007:897: bzhi pa gnyis bskum lnga pa gcig /
NK013(pa)007:898: phyir 'phyar drug pa gnyis su bskum //
NK013(pa)007:899: bdun brgyad rim bzhin re re 'phyar //
NK013(pa)007:900: rim par rta rkang chu skyes dang //
NK013(pa)007:901: sgrom dang za ra tshags sna 'phyong //
NK013(pa)007:903: snam bu gsum pa'i phyi thig dang //
NK013(pa)007:904: tshangs thig 'dzom sa nas bzung ste //
NK013(pa)007:905: cha phran gnyis kyis glang rgyab dbus //
NK013(pa)007:906: mun pa'i phyi thig tshangs gnas kyi //
NK013(pa)007:907: g.yas g.yon cha phran gnyis 'das nas //
NK013(pa)007:908: sngar bzhin bskor ba mun pa'i mthongs //
NK013(pa)007:909: mu ran cha phran gcig gis bskor /
NK013(pa)007:912: gdugs ni cha phran re re'o //
NK013(pa)007:913: mda' thig zur nas cha phran gcig /
NK013(pa)007:914: dor mthar gcig dang gnyis gnyis dang //
NK013(pa)007:915: cha chen gcig tu bskor ba ni //
NK013(pa)007:916: rtsibs rten pad+ma rdo ra dang //
NK013(pa)007:917: me yi ra ba rnams kyi sa //
NK013(pa)007:918: rtsa thig sgo khyud 'dzom rtse nas //
NK013(pa)007:919: rtsibs brten tshangs thig 'dzom pa'i bar //
NK013(pa)007:920: g.yas nas gcig shos g.yon nas g.yas //
NK013(pa)007:924: spyod lam ni ye thig gi skabs bzhin 'dir yang shes par bya ba nyid do //
NK013(pa)007:925: dam ye'i thig 'debs tshul 'brel bar 'og tu gsungs
NK013(pa)007:926: kyang las thig ma btab par sta gon gyi lha
NK013(pa)007:927: gnas nges pa mi rtogs pa'i phyir /
NK013(pa)007:930: thig gi man+dala de'i mthar lha grangs sogs ci 'byor ba'i mchod pa bshams la /
NK013(pa)007:931: dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su bdag gi thugs ka'i sa
NK013(pa)007:932: bon las spros pa'i gzhal yas khang mtshan nyid thams
NK013(pa)007:933: cad yongs su rdzogs par bskyed la /
NK013(pa)007:934: lha gnas so sor rang rang gi sngags brjod cing
NK013(pa)007:935: byang sems dkar dmar tsan+dana dang sbyar ba'i thig le
NK013(pa)007:936: gtso bo'i gnas su gru bzhi dang /
NK013(pa)007:937: gzhan rnams su zlum por byas la /
NK013(pa)007:938: me tog gi tshom bu bkod nas /
NK013(pa)007:940: bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su nyi ma dang zla ba'i gdan la 'dug par mos la /
NK013(pa)007:941: gtso bo yab yum gyi nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i
NK013(pa)007:942: sgo nas snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems
NK013(pa)007:943: sprin sku'i dbyibs brgyud rdo rje'i lam nas yum gyi
NK013(pa)007:944: pad+mora spros pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rgyal ba'i dkyil
NK013(pa)007:945: 'khor gyi 'khor lor rdzogs pa rnams rang rang gi
NK013(pa)007:946: gnas ji lta bar bzhugs par bsam la /
NK013(pa)007:947: gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul //
NK013(pa)007:957: spos dang bcas pa'i rdor dril 'dzin bzhin pas /
NK013(pa)007:958: mgon po kun mkhyen bdag nyid can //
NK013(pa)007:959: gcig dang du ma yongs grol phyir //
NK013(pa)007:960: ma lus bdag nyid dgongs su gsol //
NK013(pa)007:961: khyed rnams mos shing mchod pa dang //
NK013(pa)007:962: khams gsum yongs su bzung bya zhing //
NK013(pa)007:963: rang bzhin mnyam par bya ba'i phyir //
NK013(pa)007:964: che ge mo bdag dkyil 'khor gyi //
NK013(pa)007:965: las rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid //
NK013(pa)007:966: thugs rjes nye bar dgongs mdzad de //
NK013(pa)007:967: dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs nas ni //
NK013(pa)007:968: sa 'di yongs su bzung bar mdzod //
NK013(pa)007:970: zhes gsol ba btab pas lha thams cad dgyes par
NK013(pa)007:971: rol pa'i gzi byin mtha' yas pas de nyid du
NK013(pa)007:972: thim pas thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du
NK013(pa)007:973: gsal bar bsam pa de dag ni lhag gnas kyi
NK013(pa)007:974: cho ga ste nub gnyis pa'i bya ba'o //
NK013(pa)007:975: gnyis pa dngos gzhi'i cho ga la /
NK013(pa)007:984: tshon gyis bri ba gnyis las /
NK013(pa)007:986: nangs par be ga kra ma yam zhes 'degs pa'i rgyas sta gon gyi lha nam mkhar btegs la /
NK013(pa)007:987: tshom bu rnams gzhan du bsal /
NK013(pa)007:988: sngar rab gnas byas pa'i ye shes kyi thig skud
NK013(pa)007:989: de nyid slob dpon bdag po'i nga rgyal gyis nub
NK013(pa)007:990: nas shar dang / thig g.yog yum du mos pa shar nas nub tu phyogs pa la /
NK013(pa)007:991: g.yon ba'i khu tshur gyi lte bar bzung nas /
NK013(pa)007:992: dzahdzahdzahzhesa brjod pas thig skud kyi rtse mo nas g.yas pas bzung ba thig g.yog la gtod cing /
NK013(pa)007:993: des kyang de skad brjod cing drangs la shar nub kyi tshangs thig dang po dang /
NK013(pa)007:994: lhor gnas te byang du blta bas tshangs thig gnyis pa dang /
NK013(pa)007:995: mer gnas te rlung du blta bas zur thig dang po dang /
NK013(pa)007:996: bden bral nas dbang ldan du blta bas zur thig gnyis pa dang /
NK013(pa)007:997: mer gnas te byang du blta bas shar gyi rtsa thig dang /
NK013(pa)007:998: rlung nas lhor blta bas nub kyi dang /
NK013(pa)007:999: slar yang rlung nas shar du blta bas byang gi dang /
NK013(pa)007:1000: yang me nas nub tu blta bas lho'i rtsa thig ste /
NK013(pa)007:1001: thig chen brgyad po las thig gi steng gi nam
NK013(pa)007:1002: mkha' la mtheb 'dzub gnyis kyis se gol gyi sgra
NK013(pa)007:1005: badz+ra s+au tra sa ma ya ma ti kra ma h+aum phata /
NK013(pa)007:1006: ces brjod pas mkha' khab kyi rgyal ba rnams sad
NK013(pa)007:1007: cing ye shes kyi thig dam tshig gi thig la
NK013(pa)007:1008: ro mnyam du gyur par bsam mo //
NK013(pa)007:1009: thig skud sngar gyi snod du bzhag pa kun bzang /
NK013(pa)007:1012: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas la /
NK013(pa)007:1013: badz+ra muh zhes pas thig skud kyi ye shes pa nam mkha'i lha'i thugs kar gshegs /
NK013(pa)007:1014: ye thig thebs nas de la 'go ma dgos pa byung na /
NK013(pa)007:1015: h+r+aih zhes sgra ring po dang /
NK013(pa)007:1016: 'degs pa'i rgyas nam mkhar bteg pa'i 'og nas 'dzul bar mos shing /
NK013(pa)007:1017: sgo thad kyi rtsa thig phyis la /
NK013(pa)007:1018: slar yang phab la bstim mo //
NK013(pa)007:1020: skud pa chad na slob dpon 'chi //
NK013(pa)007:1021: thig sna shor na slob bu 'chi //
NK013(pa)007:1022: phyogs 'khrul bas ni gnyis ka nyams //
NK013(pa)007:1023: rgyun chad lam la gnod par 'gyur //
NK013(pa)007:1024: de phyir mkhas ldan sgrims te bya //
NK013(pa)007:1025: zhes bshad pa bzhin shes par bya'o //
NK013(pa)007:1026: gnyis pa tshon gyis bri ba ni /
NK013(pa)007:1027: dbang phyug rgyas pa'i chas su zhugs te /
NK013(pa)007:1028: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su phur bu dngos su btab
NK013(pa)007:1029: pa yin na tshon sna lnga 'byung rigs sdebs pa
NK013(pa)007:1030: / m+aum t+aam sogs rim par brjod cing khung bu
NK013(pa)007:1031: mnyam par bkang la 'byung ba rim brtsegs su sgom
NK013(pa)007:1032: / / slar yang g.yas pa'i mtheb srin gyis tshon
NK013(pa)007:1033: rtsi lnga cung zad blangs pa g.yon pa'i mthil du
NK013(pa)007:1034: / / bzhag la / sarba pany+tsa rat+na sa ma
NK013(pa)007:1035: ya h'u h'u zhes bzlas la g.yas pa'i sor mo
NK013(pa)007:1036: lnga la nyi ma'i steng du dpa' bo 'bru lnga
NK013(pa)007:1037: gnas par bsam ste sor mo lnga tshoms kyis g.yon
NK013(pa)007:1038: pa'i tshon rtsi khung bu'i steng du bkod la /
NK013(pa)007:1039: don ye shes lnga mtshon pa'i rtags rin po che
NK013(pa)007:1040: lnga las grub pa'i ri rab tu gyur par bsam
NK013(pa)007:1041: mo // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas
NK013(pa)007:1042: pa'i g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis dbang ldan nas brtsams
NK013(pa)007:1043: te rtsig pa lnga phyi nas ljang dmar ser dkar
NK013(pa)007:1044: sngo ba rnams zheng thig skud gang dang dpangs mathe'u
NK013(pa)007:1045: chung phyed tsam pa ma 'dres shing snyoms pa sgo
NK013(pa)007:1046: tshad gcig gi tshad tsam du bris te ka p+aa
NK013(pa)007:1048: rtsig pa sbrel ran pa na kha phye la pra brtag ste /
NK013(pa)007:1049: ku ku r+aa rdzas mnyam sbyor dkyil chog tu /
NK013(pa)007:1050: re kh+aa dma' bas mi 'grub cing //
NK013(pa)007:1051: yon pos gdung ba bskyed par byed //
NK013(pa)007:1052: chad pas slob dpon slob ma dag /
NK013(pa)007:1054: chad lhag las ni nad byung zhing //
NK013(pa)007:1056: zhes gsungs pa ltar shes par bya zhing /
NK013(pa)007:1058: de kho na nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis skyon thams cad sel ba yin no //
NK013(pa)007:1059: slob dpon gyis rdzogs par bri mi nus na /
NK013(pa)007:1060: slob ma rnams kyis kyang lag pa byin rlabs sngar bzhin byas nas bri bar bya ste /
NK013(pa)007:1061: de la dbus kyi lte ba mthing ga /
NK013(pa)007:1071: rtsibs brten sngon po la rdo rje'i phreng ba /
NK013(pa)007:1075: d+r+wa ba'i gzhi nag po la d+r+wa ba dkar po /
NK013(pa)007:1076: shar bu gzhi sngon po la za ra tshags dkar po /
NK013(pa)007:1077: mda' yab dkar po mchod rten ris /
NK013(pa)007:1078: mun pa dang glang rgyab nag po /
NK013(pa)007:1079: rta babs snam bu brgyad kyi rta rkang gzhi sngon po la rdo rje 'greng bu /
NK013(pa)007:1082: za ra tshags dkar po la gzhi nag po /
NK013(pa)007:1084: sgril 'phyang gzhi nag po la dra ba dkar po /
NK013(pa)007:1085: shar bu dkar po sngon po'i gzhir sgrigs pa /
NK013(pa)007:1086: rgya phubs khyung mgo mthing ga /
NK013(pa)007:1088: 'khor lo dang ri dwags ser po /
NK013(pa)007:1094: rdo ra gzhi mthing ga la rdo rje dkar po'am ser po /
NK013(pa)007:1095: me ri sna tshogs sgo dang sgo khyud kyi mtshams bzhir zla phyed rdo rje /
NK013(pa)007:1096: rta babs dang mda' yab kyi khor yug la rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa dang /
NK013(pa)007:1097: sgo'i phyi rol du t+aa la'i ljon pa /
NK013(pa)007:1100: khrus kyi rdzing bu rnams phyogs rer gnyis gnyis rnams spel mar bris la /
NK013(pa)007:1101: tshon gyis bri ba'i las rdzogs pa'i mthar /
NK013(pa)007:1104: bzhi bsnol sogs kyis mchod nas /
NK013(pa)007:1105: badz+ra muhs ye shes pa nam mkha'i lha'i thugs kar gshegs nas dman pa rnams dben par bzhag go //
NK013(pa)007:1107: bag med gyur pa'i nyes pa yang //
NK013(pa)007:1108: bshad pa'i rjes su shes par bya //
NK013(pa)007:1109: zhes pas thig gi skabs su bshad pas mtshon cing /
NK013(pa)007:1110: ji bzhin pa ma 'grub na de sel ba'i gnyen po'ang sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
NK013(pa)007:1111: gnyis pa rnams pa dgod pa ni /
NK013(pa)007:1112: rin po che'am lde gu sogs las byas pa'i lha
NK013(pa)007:1113: so so'i sku brnyan yod na de dang de'i gnas
NK013(pa)007:1115: med na tshon gyis bris pa'i rjes 'brel nyid du sku gzugs sam /
NK013(pa)007:1118: rang mdog dang mtshungs pa'i thig le'i rnam pa can gyi bar ci nus su bri zhing /
NK013(pa)007:1120: gtso bo'i gzugs su rdzogs par bri /
NK013(pa)007:1122: / 'khor rnams phyag rgya dag tu bya //
NK013(pa)007:1123: phal pa dag la yig 'brus so //
NK013(pa)007:1124: zhes rim pa tha dad du bri tshul yang bshad do //
NK013(pa)007:1125: gsum pa rab gnas bya ba la gsum las /
NK013(pa)007:1126: dang po bum pa'i rab gnas dang /
NK013(pa)007:1127: gnyis pa slob ma rab gnas gnyis gong du song /
NK013(pa)007:1128: gsum pa dkyil 'khor rab gnas la dkyil 'khor brgyan pa dang /
NK013(pa)007:1131: sngar lhag gnas byas pa'i bum pa rnams spos dang
NK013(pa)007:1132: rol mos sna drangs te dkyil 'khor la g.yas su
NK013(pa)007:1133: bskor nas lha so so'i gnas rnams su many+dzi la
NK013(pa)007:1134: sogs pa'i stegs la dgod cing /
NK013(pa)007:1135: bum pa lnga'am gcig tu bsdus pa la ni gtso
NK013(pa)007:1136: bo lnga'i gnas sam dbus nyid du bzhugs su gsol
NK013(pa)007:1139: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' skor dri bzang gis byug cing /
NK013(pa)007:1140: me tog gi sil ma bkram /
NK013(pa)007:1141: phyogs kun tu bla re dang yol ba dang /
NK013(pa)007:1144: ba dan sna tshogs pa dang /
NK013(pa)007:1145: gos zung du mas bkod legs su brgyan par bya zhing /
NK013(pa)007:1149: dri chab rnams lha grangs dang mnyam pa dang /
NK013(pa)007:1150: gzhan yang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa rnams dang /
NK013(pa)007:1151: sman gtor la sogs pa nang gi mchod pa rnams
NK013(pa)007:1152: kyang ci 'byor bas phyi'i khor yug rnams mdzes par
NK013(pa)007:1153: bya ste / bcos bu'i ras ni sna tshogs dang //
NK013(pa)007:1154: rgyan phreng btung dang bro bas bskor //
NK013(pa)007:1156: skabs 'di dag tu bgegs bskrad cing mtshams bcad pa /
NK013(pa)007:1157: dkyil 'khor bskyed nas lha bstim pa /
NK013(pa)007:1159: phyag 'tshal ba rnams cho ga rgyas pa'i yan lag tu 'byung yang /
NK013(pa)007:1160: rtsa ba'i rtsis 'gos ma bsdus pas chad pa'i dgag cha chung zhing /
NK013(pa)007:1161: 'jug pa bde ba'i dbang du byas nas 'dir de tsam mo //
NK013(pa)007:1162: gsum pa rab gnas dngos dang /
NK013(pa)007:1164: 'dir rgyas pa'i las dang sbrel te gzhan du bshad pa bzhin bya'o //
NK013(pa)007:1165: lnga pa dkyil 'khor sgrub pa la /
NK013(pa)007:1168: mchod bstod sogs bya ba dang /
NK013(pa)007:1169: dzapa bzla ba dang bzhi las /
NK013(pa)007:1173: slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi shar ngos su phyogs pa dang /
NK013(pa)007:1174: gzhan rnams kyang ji ltar 'os par 'dug nas /
NK013(pa)007:1175: thog mar rgyud sbyang ba nas bzung mchod rdzas byin gyis rlob pa'i bar sngon du bya ba'o //
NK013(pa)007:1177: bdag mdun tha dad du sgrub pa dang /
NK013(pa)007:1178: tha mi dad du sgrub pa gnyis las /
NK013(pa)007:1180: bdag gi rnal 'byor bzlas pa'i bar byas nas /
NK013(pa)007:1181: de'i nyer bsdu'i na da shin tu phra ba'i de kho na nyid dang /
NK013(pa)007:1182: mdun bskyed la ltos pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ting
NK013(pa)007:1183: nge 'dzin mtshams sbyar nas slar yang mdun bskyed sgrub
NK013(pa)007:1184: par mdzad mod / 'di'i gzhung du gsal bar ma bshad kyang /
NK013(pa)007:1185: don gyi dgongs pa lugs phyi ma ltar gnas pa las 'dir de ltar bya ste /
NK013(pa)007:1186: de la bsgrub gzhi bdag dang /
NK013(pa)007:1187: bris pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis sgrub chos ting nge 'dzin gsum nas /
NK013(pa)007:1188: dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub //
NK013(pa)007:1189: ces pa'i bar gyi gdod nas dag cing grub pa'i
NK013(pa)007:1190: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bdag mdun dbyer med du
NK013(pa)007:1191: gsal btab la / dbang bskur ba dang /
NK013(pa)007:1193: ye shes pa spyan drangs shing bstim pa rnams sgrub thabs bzhin shes par bya ba las /
NK013(pa)007:1194: dkyil 'khor rab gnas sogs dang ma 'brel ba'i sgrub
NK013(pa)007:1195: mchod phal pa tsam la sngar nam mkha' bzhugs pa'i
NK013(pa)007:1196: sta gon gyi dkyil 'khor yang spyan drangs nas skabs
NK013(pa)007:1197: 'dir bstim pa ni khyad par ro //
NK013(pa)007:1198: gsum pa mchod bstod sogs bya ba ni /
NK013(pa)007:1199: rang nyid dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo las gtso bo gnyis par bya bas phyag mchod nas bzung /
NK013(pa)007:1200: dam baca'i mthar thug gi bar sgrub thabs bzhin byas la /
NK013(pa)007:1201: bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' mdun bskyed dang ro gcig tu gyur par bsam mo //
NK013(pa)007:1202: bzhi pa dzapa bzla ba la /
NK013(pa)007:1203: sa bcad kyi chings sgrub thabs bzhin las /
NK013(pa)007:1205: dbye gzhi'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba las /
NK013(pa)007:1206: b+h+r+aum bi shwa sogs kyis bdag dam tshig gi 'khor
NK013(pa)007:1207: lo las mdun bskyed ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i ngo
NK013(pa)007:1208: bor rten dang brten par bcas pa logs su phye
NK013(pa)007:1209: nas mdun gyi nam mkhar me ri 'dabs 'byar gyi
NK013(pa)007:1210: tshul du bzhugs par mos pa tsam ste /
NK013(pa)007:1211: dmigs pa'i rnam pa sgrub thabs dang dbye ba med kyang /
NK013(pa)007:1212: don gyi ngo bo mi 'dra ba'i gnad shes par bya'o //
NK013(pa)007:1213: dzapa bzla ba na dam ye 'phro 'du ste gsal
NK013(pa)007:1214: ba gsum gyi ngang nas lha so so'i sngags bzla
NK013(pa)007:1217: rnam shes nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid //
NK013(pa)007:1218: sems phyir mtshan nyid ma skyes pa //
NK013(pa)007:1219: mi bskyod yab yum rang bzhin las //
NK013(pa)007:1220: ting 'dzin thugs su dbang bsgyur bas //
NK013(pa)007:1221: dngos grub las rnams kun byed shog /
NK013(pa)007:1225: gzugs phung sa yi ngo bo nyid //
NK013(pa)007:1226: sems phyir snang mdzad yab yum ting 'dzin sku ru dngos grub dzi na dzika /
NK013(pa)007:1228: tshor ba chu yi sems phyir 'byung ldan ting 'dzin yon tan dngos grub s+w+aam rat+na d+h+rika /
NK013(pa)007:1230: 'du shes me yi sems phyir mtha' yas ting 'dzin
NK013(pa)007:1231: gsung dngos grub +aam +aa ro lika p+aam r+aa ga
NK013(pa)007:1232: ra ti / 'du byed lung gi sems phyir don
NK013(pa)007:1233: grub ting 'dzin phrin las dngos grub h+aam pra dz+ny+aa
NK013(pa)007:1234: ra ti / d+h+rika / t+aam badz+ra ra ti /
NK013(pa)007:1236: so so'i dzapa bskul dang sbyar te rim pa bzhin
NK013(pa)007:1237: gtso 'khor gyi 'gros sbyar nas ci nus su bzla
NK013(pa)007:1238: zhing / skabs kyi mjug bsdu ba'i las rim rnam pa gsum yang sgrub thabs bzhin no //
NK013(pa)007:1239: de dag ni sgrub cing mchod pa'i cho ga'o //
NK013(pa)007:1240: drug pa dbang bskur ba la /
NK013(pa)007:1242: slob ma la dbang bskur ba'o //
NK013(pa)007:1244: slob ma 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin dkyil 'khor du zhugs la dbang blang ba'am /
NK013(pa)007:1245: rig pa'i me tog dor ba nyid kyis kyang 'di'i dgos pa 'grub cing /
NK013(pa)007:1246: gang gi tshe yang slob ma 'jug par gnang ba nod pa rnams so //
NK013(pa)007:1247: gnyis pa slob ma gzhug cing dbang bskur ba ni /
NK013(pa)007:1248: dbang gi cho ga zur du 'chad pa las shes par bya'o //
NK013(pa)007:1249: gsum pa rjes kyi cho ga la lnga las /
NK013(pa)007:1251: gnyis pa brtan skyong ni sgrub thabs kyi dkyus bzhin dang /
NK013(pa)007:1253: gtang rag gi mchod pa bshams la byin gyis brlab ste /
NK013(pa)007:1257: bstod pa rgyas bsdus ci rigs pas bstod /
NK013(pa)007:1258: yig brgya dang bzod gsol rnams spyi dang mthun par byas la /
NK013(pa)007:1259: ras bris yin na ye shes pa brtan bzhugs dang /
NK013(pa)007:1260: b+h+r+aum bi shwa sogs kyis dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gsal btab la /
NK013(pa)007:1262: zhes sogs brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsdus la /
NK013(pa)007:1264: lus bsrung sogs mtha' rgyas rnams sgrub thabs ltar bya zhing /
NK013(pa)007:1265: rdul tshon gyi cho ga zhag sbrel mar byed pa'i nyi ma snga ma rnams la'ang de bzhin no //
NK013(pa)007:1266: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gshegs gsol byed na /
NK013(pa)007:1268: zhes pas ye shes kyi 'khor lo nam mkhar bteg nas /
NK013(pa)007:1270: bzod gsol sngar bzhin byas la //
NK013(pa)007:1271: khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
NK013(pa)007:1272: sogs kyi mthar dz+ny+aa na man+dala badz+ra muh zhes gshegs su gsol la /
NK013(pa)007:1273: dam tshig gi 'khor lo sngar bzhin bsdus nas go cha bgo zhing lus bsrung ba byas la /
NK013(pa)007:1274: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mos te /
NK013(pa)007:1275: rol mo'i sgra dang bcas pas a k+aa ro bzla zhing /
NK013(pa)007:1276: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag gis thog mar lha mtshan rnams bsdus la /
NK013(pa)007:1277: cung zad tsam mgo bor bkod /
NK013(pa)007:1278: lhag ma rnams dbang ldan nas brtsam ste gtso bo'i
NK013(pa)007:1279: gnas kyi bar du phyags la bum pa la sogs
NK013(pa)007:1280: pa'i snod bzang por blugs nas mchod pa dang bkur
NK013(pa)007:1281: sti chen pos chu klung du dor /
NK013(pa)007:1282: slar yang snod de nyid chus bkang nas nang du
NK013(pa)007:1283: 'ongs te dkyil 'khor khang pa rnams bsang gtor bya
NK013(pa)007:1284: / de nas h'u mdzad kyi phyag rgya las mdzub
NK013(pa)007:1285: mo gnyis bsnol ba skam pa'i rgyas 'og gi phur
NK013(pa)007:1286: bu nas bzung mas rim gyis phyungs la /
NK013(pa)007:1287: spyan ma'i sngags bzlas pa'i 'o mas phur rtse bkru
NK013(pa)007:1288: zhing khung bu rnams la'ang gtor bas bgegs rnams bde
NK013(pa)007:1289: stong gi ngo bor sangs rgyas par bsam mo //
NK013(pa)007:1290: de nas dge ba bsngo zhing smon lam gdab pa dang /
NK013(pa)007:1291: bkra shis brjod cing dga' ston bya ba la sogs
NK013(pa)007:1292: te rjes kyi bya ba rnams gsang ba spyi'i 'gros
NK013(pa)007:1294: spyi don gsum pa grub pa 'bras bu'i tshul la /
NK013(pa)007:1296: de grub pa'i tshad bstan pa ste sgrub thabs su bshad pa bzhin shes par bya ba yin no //
NK013(pa)007:1297: khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gi lam //
NK013(pa)007:1298: sras bcas rgyal ba kun gyis bgrod pa'i zhing //
NK013(pa)007:1299: grub mchog bye ba'i 'jug ngogs bla na med //
NK013(pa)007:1300: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba gsang chen mchog gi rtse //
NK013(pa)007:1301: de las bgrang yas dngos grub kun gyi gzhir //
NK013(pa)007:1302: dang por 'jug dang bar du nyams len srog /
NK013(pa)007:1303: mthar thug 'bras bu mngon du byed pa'i thabs //
NK013(pa)007:1304: kun kyang dkyil 'khor las dang 'brel ba'i phyir //
NK013(pa)007:1305: rnam dag gzhung bzang nges pa'i zab don gnad //
NK013(pa)007:1306: dad pa'i snying la cha tsam 'phos gyur pas //
NK013(pa)007:1307: zab yangs rgyud don pha mthar mtshon min kyang //
NK013(pa)007:1308: rgya mtsho'i chu thigs kyis kyang gdung sel bzhin //
NK013(pa)007:1309: rang dang skal mnyam rjes su 'brang rnams la //
NK013(pa)007:1310: phan phyir nyung gsal snying por dril ba'i ngag /
NK013(pa)007:1311: brjod 'dis rnam dag ngo mtshar rin po che'i //
NK013(pa)007:1312: phreng ba tshar du dngar ba'i dga' ston grub /
NK013(pa)007:1314: / 'di las dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' che //
NK013(pa)007:1315: dbyings phyug rdo rje btsun mor dgyes rol ba'i //
NK013(pa)007:1316: dga' chen rol mo rtag pa'i rdo rje yis //
NK013(pa)007:1317: mkha' mnyam 'gro ba yongs la khyab byed shog /
NK013(pa)007:1318: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho
NK013(pa)007:1319: ga rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba 'di
NK013(pa)007:1320: yang shing rta chen po sangs rgyas gsang ba'i gzhung
NK013(pa)007:1321: ji lta ba bzhin du rig pa 'dzin pa 'gyur
NK013(pa)007:1322: med rdo rjes rang lo zhe brgyad pa la o
NK013(pa)007:1323: rgyan smin grol gling gi chos grwar sbyar ba'i thog
NK013(pa)007:1324: ma'i yi ge pa ni skad gnyis smra ba'i bshes
